Text: Thanks for the upload but at least seed till one gets it. So we can seed.
Any chance of getting the updated railworks 3 version this is for railworks 2. The update is free from the aerosoft website if you bought the route. Thanks for the upload.
I downloaded this thinking it was for Railworks 3. I installed it and it works perfectly fine! THanks for the upload harz_er! Again another great route with some detailed and very fine scenery!
Works fine in rw3. Thanks harz_er.

Yes it will work in railworks 3 but it isn't updated for railworks 3. Anything from railworks 2 will work in railworks 3 but without all the bells and whistles. Just to clarify bells and whistles is a figure of speech.
